name: Caesar Dip
description: This dip is creamy and garlicky, made extra thick for perfect scooping. Whether you're dunking bread, chips, or veggies, this dip won't let you down.
preparation: In a food processor or blender, combine cream cheese, mayo, sour cream, Parmesan cheese, dressing mix, and lemon juice. Pulse until smooth, scraping down sides as necessary.
Transfer to a serving bowl. If you have time, refrigerate 10 min.
Serve with fresh. sliced veggies or crackers.

products.name: Caesar Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is a little bit of magic: It’s rich, creamy, full of flavor, and it has zero sodium! Take it far beyond Caesar salad and use it as a sauce for pizza, a dip for veggies, chicken fingers, and zucchini fries, or mix it in your white pasta sauce. Simply mix the blend with mayo or Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, and milk, and it’s ready for anything!
